EmailTemplate.description: This email will be sent when a new GDC Tech Case needs to be Assigned
EmailTemplate.name: GDC New Case Needs Assigned
EmailTemplate.subject: GDC Tech Case Needs to be Assigned
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
{!Case.Priority} priority case, {!Case.Case_Number__c}, has been in New status for {!Case.Age_in_Hours__c} hours. Please assign this case to the appropriate Tech Agent and change the status to Assigned.
Please click below to go to the Case detail page: {!Case.Link}
Thank you, Honeywell Global Data Center Web: http://www.Mygdc.com
